General.Name: Jet Airways (India) Limited
General.Description: Jet Airways (India) Limited provides passenger and cargo air transportation services. It also provides aircraft leasing services. It operates flights to 66 destinations in India and international countries. As of November 22, 2018, the company had a fleet of 124 aircraft, comprising Boeing 777-300 ERs, Airbus A330-200/300, the latest Boeing 737 Max 8, Next Generation Boeing 737s, and ATR 72-500/600s. Jet Airways (India) Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in Mumbai, India.
